note:
kuriko is an entity.

kuriko is pansexual, do not bring them to a cookware shop.

kuriko has yet to figure out their gender after the 2024 gender-in-blender incident, but currently they considers themself to be enby, trans, and maybe genderfluid.

kuriko accepts pats, snugs, and platonic flirts.

kuriko meows, you can meow at them on fedi or in real life.

kuriko sometimes posts horny stuff behind content warnings. they also have a horny alt at @kuriko (most new contents are followers only).

kuriko accepts command line arguments.
